attributes.action: Students aged 14+ can drop out of education.
attributes.background: I think students are quite bored of school and are more inspired to start working at a young age to get their monthly allowance. By the age of 14 the lack of encouragement for education is quite huge so results turn out to be lower. Students have the right to speak for once.

rejection.details: When you start your petition again, it would help if your petition asked more clearly for pupils aged 14+ to be allowed to leave full time education and get jobs.
